mapper.sql: ID, CHINESE_NAME, PARENT_ID, SEQ, CREATE_TIME, PIC_URL, ENGLISH_NAME
mapper.insert: insert into brand (ID, CHINESE_NAME, PARENT_ID, SEQ, CREATE_TIME, PIC_URL, ENGLISH_NAME) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chineseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update brand
CHINESE_NAME = #{chineseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PIC_URL = #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENGLISH_NAME = #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update brand set CHINESE_NAME = #{chineseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PIC_URL = #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENGLISH_NAME = #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from brand order by seq
